channel.title: R on Gerardo Moreno's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in R on Gerardo Moreno's Blog

item.title: Introducing DASC 1104's Final Project
item.description: For this project, I am examining the English Premier League statistics by players stats, like height/age compared to their respective position. For example, in the datasets “epl_players_stats.csv” and “players_1920_fin.csv” from FiveThirtyEight, the file goes into full detail about players like height, position, goals per game, goals given up, age, ect, so I will be examining if a player if more likely to succeed in this league based on their height or age.

item.title: My First Post
item.description: This is my first post. I would like to just let you guys know I like penguins and the razorbacks. Woo Pig! library(tidyverse) library(palmerpenguins) glimpse(penguins) ## Observations: 344 ## Variables: 8 ## $ species <fct> Adelie, Adelie, Adelie, Adelie, Adelie, Adelie, Ade… ## $ island <fct> Torgersen, Torgersen, Torgersen, Torgersen, Torgers… ## $ bill_length_mm <dbl> 39.1, 39.5, 40.3, NA, 36.7, 39.3, 38.9, 39.2, 34.1,… ## $ bill_depth_mm <dbl> 18.
